prompt:
Nurse: Hold on a second while I figure out how I can best support you. Just give me a second to work out the best way I can assist you.

Patient: Well, you're supposed to be talking to me about this colonoscopy that I have. I'm not sure what else you wanna help me with.

Nurse: Just give me a second to work out the best way I can assist you. I apologize for the confusion earlier. I'm here to ensure you have everything you need for your colonoscopy. I hope this procedure gives you and your doctor the answers you're looking for. Would it be okay if we go over a few topics on prep for your colonoscopy?

Patient: Yes.

Nurse: Thank you. I'm calling today to ensure you have everything you need. I will also call you again the day before your procedure. Let's first get all the logistics out of the way. Your colonoscopy procedure is on August 17 at 11:00 AM with Doctor Meredith Bailey. You'll need to arrive about 1 hour before at 10:00 AM. Is that okay with you?

Patient: Yes.

Nurse: Excellent. Once you get to O'Connor hospital, your check-in location will be on the 1st Floor. Does that sound good to you?

Patient: Yes.

responses.gpt4: I'm glad to hear that. Is there anything else about the logistics that's worrying you or anything about the day of the procedure that you'd like to clarify?
responses.our_model: Great. Is there anything else about the logistics that���s worrying you?
